casebody.data:
IN RE: HODGE 182A15-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2017 Steven Armstrong, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Adam Jarmal Hodge, for Hodge, Adam Jarmal.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by Petitioner to Proceed In Forma Pauperis with the Register of Deeds:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2017."
